name: Chameleon: To Dye For!
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Challenge your friends to a unique and addicting puzzler in Chameleon! Select from 4 different characters each with their unique abilities that can help turn the odds in your favor. Master the game and unlock the ultimate secret character. Various modes of play including Normal, King and Goal Modes, each with their own rule sets, objectives and challenges, will entertain for hours! With puzzles being randomly generated, no two games are alike! It's unlimited color puzzle fun!
